title: Scale Function
description: This function scales an input value X using a scaling factor K and an offset O. The resulting value is then limited between the minimum value MN and the maximum value MX.
name: SCALE

input.name: X
input.description: The input value that will be scaled.

input.name: K
input.description: The scaling factor applied to the input value.

input.name: O
input.description: The offset to be added to the scaled input value.

input.name: MX
input.description: The maximum limit for the scaled value.

input.name: MN
input.description: The minimum limit for the scaled value.

return_value.description: The scaled value limited between MN and MX.
